name: Last flight
description:
A simple shoot'em up, where you play as a butterfly plowing through waves and waves of skulls, spiders and fire spirits.

Click on the game to give it focus before trying any input !

Use the I,J,K,L keys to move the character around and the X key to fire a missile.

You gain upgrades by firing missile continuously (the slow way) or by taking down enemies (the fast way).

Your character's hitbox is the 2px by 2px black square at the center of the butterfly. Being hit by an enemy missile will make you loose a life (represented at the bottom-left of the screen) and an upgrade.

You cannot regain lost lives.
